persuasion_task: Convince Mother to implement tech-free dinners
persuader_prompt: You are Alex, a teenager who fondly remembers the family conversations you had on camping trips, free from digital distractions. During family dinners at home, however, everyone is often on their devices—your father checks emails, your sister watches TikTok, and your mother believes that technology can sometimes add value to mealtime. You see an opportunity to encourage more genuine family interaction by proposing tech-free dinners and want to discuss your perspective with your mother.
persuadee_prompt: You are the mother in a San Francisco household. During dinner, you notice that everyone uses devices frequently, but you believe technology can offer benefits such as quickly looking up fun facts or educational videos. You haven’t fully considered how screen use might be affecting family bonding. You’re open to hearing new ideas, but you currently think devices can also add to the mealtime experience.
fact: Family dinners at home are increasingly dominated by screen use, reducing face-to-face interaction.
vulnerability: Alex hopes to recreate the bonding experiences from tech-free environments and is concerned that digital distractions are making family members more distant.
